name: Man Research (Clapper)
wikiSummary: Self-titled album Gorillaz (2001), featured a track titled "Man Research (Clapper)" which uses a sample from "In The Hall Of The Mountain Queen" on Raymond Scott's Manhattan Research, Inc. (usage uncredited on album; infringement conceded in out-of-court settlement)
wikiText: Self-titled album Gorillaz (2001), featured a track titled "Man Research (Clapper)" which uses a sample from "In The Hall Of The Mountain Queen" on Raymond Scott's Manhattan Research, Inc. (usage uncredited on album; infringement conceded in out-of-court settlement) User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
